content:
This is a dedicated chat room about website of Engula.

  • The website: https://engula.io/
  • The repository: https://github.com/engula/engula.github.io

See also this discussion for further information.

@tison

ideas from @tison

https://github.com/engula/engula/discussions/218#discussioncomment-1862799

main page

design in Figma(quick design for style): https://www.figma.com/file/tm9zhcNRisdiQEKG62oQvo/Untitled?node-id=0%3A1

events page

can like the: https://www.cockroachlabs.com/community/events/ (list with meta info)

blog page

can like the: https://apisix.apache.org/blog based on docusaurus

community page

  • contact sub-page
  • resources sub-page
  • team&contributors sub-page

can like the https://apisix.apache.org/docs/general/community based on docusaurus
the design of the main page aims to confirm the website`s style and brand colors, I Engula can have the unique color for self

@northisle thanks for your information. The links you share look good. Looking forward to a prototype.

Engula can have the unique color for self

What do you mean by this sentence? I like the Engula logo and it has white and black color barely :)
thanks! I also like the Engula logo, it`s simple and clean! will redesign some details in the prototype based on the color.

hi, @tison, I lunched the prototype website of Engula
https://engula-website-48kxgtabm-inorthisle.vercel.app/
can leave comments if have any doubt

image.png ,going to make the SVG animation about this part,
Effect: scale and expand it when hovering the section
@northisle thank you! I'll check it out this week.

@northisle would you mind to create a fork of engula/engula.github.io and submit a pull request to it or start an issue there? I do have some comments but it's easy to lose on chatroom. I'd prefer logging comments on GitHub and using Zulip as random topics & immediate messaging.
sure! will get start it during this week :bow:
yes, I just pushed the updates and opened the PR
let's have the conversation on the Github, if you have any question & advice, please comment :bow:
